item.title: Total Fire Ban advice for 16 October 2023
item.description:
Time of issue: {{time_of_issue}}
Date of issue: {{date_of_issue}}

A Total Fire Ban has been declared for {{declared_for}} for the local government districts listed below:

{% for region in regions %}

{{region}} Region:

    {% for district in regions[region] %}
  • {{district}} - All Day
    • {% endfor %}
{% endfor %}
